channel.title: Lighthearted a game of 80s nostalgia, neon, and magic
channel.description:
I have 3 sessions of **Lighthearted** on the calendar for Sept/Oct. Come live out your favorite 80s movie tropes in a world filled with nostalgia, neon, and magic! Play a Prep, Jock, Geek, Rebel, or Outcast as they grow beyond the labels they've lived with since high school.
S1 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7lSJcTcgbd501TSHg S2 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7lcJltGvS1NJtrbTf S3 https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-Lo7liaUGCa6s8gNHUoP
